thought: To craft cyan_terracotta, I need to place 8 terracotta in the crafting grid in a 2x2 pattern around the cyan dye. Therefore, I will first move one terracotta to the top left corner of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
